practice_phrases: 我看不到。
I can't see.
对不起，我看不到。
I'm sorry, I can't see.
我看不到她的朋友。
I can't see her friend.
这不是问题，我看不到。
This is not a problem, I can't see.
我不知道为什么我看不到。
I don't know why I can't see.
对不起我看不到你的朋友。
I'm sorry I can't see your friend.
当你和他们一起工作时我看不到。
When you work with them I can't see.
我很高兴这不是问题，因为我看不到。
I'm very happy this is not a problem, because I can't see.
当然你可以问她，因为我看不到她是我的朋友。
Of course you can ask her, because I can't see she's my friend.
我不知道为什么你认为我看不到这是这么好的东西。
I don't know why you think I can't see this is such a good thing.
给我看。
Show me.
她给我看东西。
She shows me things.
她想要给我看。
She wants to show me.
当然你可以给我看。
Of course you can show me.
我的朋友想要给我看。
My friend wants to show me.
对不起我看不到你给我看的。
I'm sorry I can't see what you show me.
我很高兴她想要给我看东西。
I'm very happy she wants to show me things.
这是我朋友想要给我看的地方。
This is the place my friend wants to show me.
当你们一起工作时她会给我看困难的事情。
When you work together she will show me difficult things.
我不知道为什么你认为她不想要给我看这么好的东西。
I don't know why you think she doesn't want to show me such good things.
她试图给我看。
She's trying to show me.
你试图给我看东西。
You're trying to show me things.
我的朋友试图给我看。
My friend is trying to show me.
对不起她试图给我看。
I'm sorry she's trying to show me.
我看不到你试图给我看的。
I can't see what you're trying to show me.
这不是问题，她试图给我看。
This is not a problem, she's trying to show me.
我很高兴我的朋友试图给我看东西。
I'm very happy my friend is trying to show me things.
当然你可以问她为什么她试图给我看。
Of course you can ask her why she's trying to show me.
我不知道为什么她试图给我看这么好的东西。
I don't know why she's trying to show me such good things.
当你们一起工作时你会非常了解她为什么试图给我看困难的事情。
When you work together you will know very well why she's trying to show me difficult things.

lego: what you're trying to show me
practice_phrases: 你试图给我看的东西。
What you're trying to show me.
我看不到你试图给我看的东西。
I can't see what you're trying to show me.
她说你试图给我看的东西。
She said what you're trying to show me.
这是你试图给我看的东西。
This is what you're trying to show me.
对不起我看不到你试图给我看的东西。
I'm sorry I can't see what you're trying to show me.
我不知道你试图给我看的东西。
I don't know what you're trying to show me.
我很高兴你试图给我看的东西这么好。
I'm very happy what you're trying to show me is so good.
这不是问题，因为我看不到你试图给我看的东西。
This is not a problem, because I can't see what you're trying to show me.
当然我的朋友想要了解你试图给我看的东西。
Of course my friend wants to know what you're trying to show me.
我不知道为什么你认为你试图给我看的东西比她正在说的更重要。
I don't know why you think what you're trying to show me is more important than what she was saying.
